alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Dickinson; Ottawa; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dickinson, eastern Ottawa, Clay, southwestern Washington and eastern Cloud Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1014 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Concordia to 5 miles northeast of Wells to near Niles. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Concordia, Clay Center, Chapman, Solomon, Wakefield, Enterprise, Clyde, Clifton, Miltonvale, Morganville, Woodbine, Palmer, Manchester, Longford, Aurora, Vining, Oak Hill, Niles and Talmage. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 289. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central, north central and east central Kansas.
